messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] and this is what I sent back......
messages.messageBody:
Hey Bridget-

<< bridget-who is about to unsub because there is almost no other discussion
going on here...
>>

I rarely post lately because of time, but I think this list is very open. If
you want another type of discussion, I think most of us would be willing to
listen rather than having you unsub.
Take care-
Carol in WI

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] and this is what I sent back......
messages.msgSnippet: What would you like to discuss Bridget? Right now, for instance, my 2 kids are dissecting one of those Headstart computers from Tiger.  It finally died this
messages.messageBody:
What would you like to discuss Bridget?

Right now, for instance, my 2 kids are "dissecting" one of those Headstart
computers from Tiger. It finally died this AM and my daughter wanted to
"dissect it to see what's inside" -- "can we, can we, Mom??"

Now, if only I knew what any of that stuff was.

Nance

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] and this is what I sent back......
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/30/00 4:09:37 AM Eastern Daylight Time, panchot@premier1.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/30/00 4:09:37 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
panchot@... writes:

<< So you are all aware. Hopefully she will not bother any of you.

Brynn >>

so, i'm confused here... what is this? dia emailed you privately... you said
you were not reading the mail... so you sent it to all of us to read? you
did not read it? what is wrong with it? she has some valid points, don't
you think? it's not rude or anything... she is just stating her opinion...
maybe i'm missing something here...
